LHAPDF grids
============

+----------------+--------------------------+-------+----------+---------+
| observable     | reaction                 | group | comments | contact |
+================+==========================+=======+==========+=========+
| ``dsig/dxdQ2`` | ``nu + p -> nu' +X``     | NNPDF | in-dev   | [rojo]  |
+----------------+--------------------------+-------+----------+---------+
| ``dsig/dxdy``  | ``e+/- + p -> e+/-' +X`` | JAM   | in-dev   | [nsato] |
+----------------+--------------------------+-------+----------+---------+


[rojo]:<mailto:j.rojo@vu.nl>
[nsato]:<mailto:nsato@jlab.org>
